    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(App app,
             processing.core.PImage sprite,
             java.lang.String spawnType)
        Constructor for the abstract class Enemy which spawns the enemy mob based on the spawnType.

        If spawnType is random, a random soil pixel will be chosen for spawn; if spawnType is a tile coordinate, a random soil pixel on that tile is chosen for spawn. Spawn direction is randomised.

        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet object
        sprite - The PImage used for the sprite of the enemy
        spawnType - Either "random" or a tile coordinate

      • checkReflections

        protected abstract void checkReflections()
        Based on the current direction of travel, this method controls an enemy's movement upon colliding with a wall or a grass tile.

      • move

        public void move()
        Basic diagonal movement implementation.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Updates the enemy sprite position every frame. Checks for collisions between the enemy sprite and green tiles. If collided, it resets the level. Called every frame from Level.renderLevel()
